GSD36visnu_pu:505: uttamarṇaś ced rājānam iyāt, tadvibhāvito 'dhamarṇo rājñe dhanadaśabhāgasaṃmitaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt prāptārthaś cottamarṇo viṃśatitamam aṃśam // Vi_6.21 //
GSD36visnu_pu:507: tasya ca bhāvanās tisro bhavanti likhitaṃ sākṣiṇaḥ samayakriyā ca //
GSD36visnu_pu:508: sasākṣikam āptaṃ sasākṣikam eva dadyāt // Vi_6.24 //
GSD36visnu_pu:510: asamagradāne lekhyāsaṃnidhāne cottamarṇaḥ svalikhitaṃ dadyāt // Vi_6.26 //
GSD36visnu_pu:511: dhanagrāhiṇi prete prevrajite dvidaśāḥ samāḥ pravasite vā tatputrapautrair dhanaṃ deyam // nātaḥ param anicchubhiḥ // Vi_6.28 //
GSD36visnu_pu:512: saputrasya vāpy aputrasya vā rikthagrāhī ṛṇaṃ dadyāt // Vi_6.29 //
GSD36visnu_pu:517: avibhaktaiḥ kṛtam ṛṇaṃ yas tiṣṭhet sa dadyāt // Vi_6.34 //
GSD36visnu_pu:518: paitṛkam ṛṇam avibhaktānāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ ca // Vi_6.35 //
GSD36visnu_pu:523: yo gṛhītvā ṛṇaṃ sarvaṃ śvo dāsyāmīti sāmakam /
GSD36visnu_pu:524: na dadyāl lobhataḥ paścāt tathā vṛddhim avāpnuyāt || Vi_6.40 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:526: ādyau tu vitathe dāpyāv itarasya sutā api || Vi_6 41 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:527: bahavaś cet pratibhuvo dadyus te 'rthaṃ yathākṛtam /
GSD36visnu_pu:528: arthe 'viśeṣite tv eṣu dhanikacchandataḥ kriyā || Vi_6 42 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:530: ṛṇikas taṃ pratibhuve dviguṇaṃ dātum arhati || Vi_6 43 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:535: yatra kvacana yena kenacil likhitaṃ sākṣibhiḥ svahastacihnitaṃ sasākṣikam // Vi_7.4 //
GSD36visnu_pu:543: varṇaiś ca tatkṛtaiś cihnaiḥ patrair eva ca yuktibhiḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:545: yatra+ṛṇī dhaniko vāpi sākṣī vā lekhako 'pi vā /
GSD36visnu_pu:546: mriyate tatra tallekhyaṃ tatsvahastaiḥ prasādhayet || Vi_7.13 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:550: anirdiṣṭas tu sākṣitve yaś copetya brūyāt // Vi_8.4 //
GSD36visnu_pu:554: kulajā vṛttavittasaṃpannā yajvānas tapasvinaḥ putriṇo dharmajñā adhīyānāḥ satyavantas traividyavṛddhāś ca // Vi_8.8 //
GSD36visnu_pu:556: dvayor vivadamānayor yasya pūrvavādas tasya sākṣiṇaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ // Vi_8.10
GSD36visnu_pu:557: ādharyaṃ kāryavaśād yatra pūrvapakṣasya bhavet tatra prativādino 'pi //
GSD36visnu_pu:558: uddiṣṭasākṣiṇi mṛte deśāntaragate ca tadabhihitaśrotāraḥ pramāṇam //
GSD36visnu_pu:562: tatpāvanāya kūśmāṇḍībhir dvijo 'gniṃ ghṛtena juhuyāt // Vi_8.16 //
GSD36visnu_pu:563: śūdra ekāhikam godaśakasya grāsaṃ dadyāt // Vi_8.17 //
GSD36visnu_pu:565: sākṣiṇaś cāhūya ādityodaye kṛtaśapathān pṛcchet // Vi_8.19 //
GSD36visnu_pu:571: ye mahāpātakināṃ lokā ye copapātakināṃ te kūṭasākṣiṇām api // Vi_8.25 //
GSD36visnu_pu:582: aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam /
GSD36visnu_pu:583: aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyate || Vi_8.36 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:584: jānanto 'pi hi ye sākṣye tūṣṇīṃbhūtā udāsate /
GSD36visnu_pu:585: te kūṭasākṣiṇāṃ pāpais tulyā daṇḍena cāpy atha || Vi_8.37 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:586: evaṃ hi sākṣiṇaḥ pṛcched varṇānukramato nṛpaḥ || Vi_8.38 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:587: yasyocuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ satyāṃ pratijñāṃ sa jayī bhavet /
GSD36visnu_pu:588: anyathā vādino yasya dhruvas tasya parājayaḥ || Vi_8.39 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:590: sameṣu ca guṇotkṛṣṭān guṇidvaidhe dvijottamān || Vi_8.40 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:591: yasmin yasmin vivāde tu kūṭasākṣy anṛtaṃ vadet /
GSD36visnu_pu:592: tattatkāryaṃ nivarteta kṛtaṃ cāpy akṛtaṃ bhavet || Vi_8.41 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:597: sarveṣv evārthajāteṣu mūlyaṃ kanakaṃ kalpayet // Vi_9.4 //
GSD36visnu_pu:598: tatra kṛṣṇalone śūdraṃ dūrvākaraṃ śāpayet // Vi_9.5 //
GSD36visnu_pu:604: tataḥ paraṃ yathārhaṃ dhaṭāgnyudakaviṣāṇām anyatamam // Vi_9.11 //
GSD36visnu_pu:610: kośasthāne brāhmaṇaṃ sītoddhṛtamahīkaram eva śāpayet // Vi_9.17 //
GSD36visnu_pu:611: prāgdṛṣṭadoṣe svalpe 'py arthe divyānām anyatamam eva kārayet // Vi_9.18
GSD36visnu_pu:612: satsu viditaṃ sac caritaṃ na mahaty arthe 'pi // Vi_9.19 //
GSD36visnu_pu:617: sā ca na vāti vāyau // Vi_9.24 //
GSD36visnu_pu:622: na śleṣmavyādhyarditānāṃ bhīrūṇāṃ śvāsakāsinām ambujīvināṃ codakam //
GSD36visnu_pu:631: tāṃ ca suvarṇakārakāṃsyakārāṇām anyatamo bibhṛyāt // Vi_10.4 //
GSD36visnu_pu:632: tatra caikasmin śikye puruṣaṃ divyakāriṇam āropayet, dvitīye pratimānaṃ śilādi // Vi_10.5
GSD36visnu_pu:633: pratimānapuruṣau samadhṛtau sucihnitau kṛtvā puruṣam avatārayet // Vi_10.6
GSD36visnu_pu:636: brahmaghnāṃ ye smṛtā lokā ye lokāḥ kūṭasākṣiṇām /
GSD36visnu_pu:637: tulādhārasya te lokās tulāṃ dhārayato mṛṣā || Vi_10.9 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:639: tvam eva dhaṭa jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ || Vi_10.10 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:641: tad enaṃ saṃśayād asmād dharmatas trātum arhasi || Vi_10.11 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:642: tatas tv āropayec chikye bhūya evātha taṃ naram /
GSD36visnu_pu:643: tulito yadi vardheta tataḥ śuddhaḥ sa dharmataḥ || Vi_10.12 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:645: evaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ jñānaṃ yato bhavati nirṇayaḥ || Vi_10.13 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:647: ṣoḍaśāṅgulaṃ tāvad antaraṃ maṇḍalasaptakaṃ kuryāt // Vi_11.2 //
GSD36visnu_pu:648: tataḥ prāṅmukhasya prasāritabhujadvayasya saptāśvatthapatrāṇi karayor dadyāt // Vi_11.3 //
GSD36visnu_pu:649: tāni ca karadvayasahitāni sūtreṇa veṣṭayet // Vi_11.4 //
GSD36visnu_pu:650: tatas tatrāgnivarṇaṃ lohapiṇḍaṃ pañcāśatpalikaṃ samaṃ nyaset // Vi_11.5 //
GSD36visnu_pu:651: tam ādāya nātidrutaṃ nātivilambitaṃ maṇḍaleṣu pādanyāsaṃ kurvan vrajet //
GSD36visnu_pu:652: tataḥ saptamaṃ maṇḍalam atītya bhūmau lohapiṇḍaṃ jahyāt // Vi_11.7 //
GSD36visnu_pu:653: yo hastayoḥ kvacid dagdhas tam aśuddhaṃ vinirdiṣet /
GSD36visnu_pu:654: na dagdhaḥ sarvathā yas tu sa viśuddho bhaven naraḥ || Vi_11.8 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:655: bhayād vā pātayed yas tu dagdho vā na vibhāvyate /
GSD36visnu_pu:656: punas taṃ hārayel lohaṃ samayasyāviśodhanāt || Vi_11.9 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:658: abhimantryāsya karayor lohapiṇḍaṃ tato nyaset || Vi_11.10 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:659: tvam agne sarvabhūtānām antaś carasi sākṣivat /
GSD36visnu_pu:660: tvam evāgne vijānīṣe na vidur yāni mānavāḥ || Vi_11.11 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:662: tad enaṃ saṃśayād asmād dharmatas trātum arhasi || Vi_11.12 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:665: tatra ...nābhimagnasyārogadveṣiṇaḥ puruṣasyānyasya jānunī gṛhītvābhimantritam ambhaḥ praviśet tatsamakālaṃ ca nātikrūramṛdunā dhanuṣā puruṣo 'paraḥ śarakṣepaṃ kuryāt //
GSD36visnu_pu:666: taṃ cāparaḥ puruṣo javena śaram ānayet // Vi_12.5 //
GSD36visnu_pu:667: tanmadhye yo na dṛśyeta sa śuddhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:668: anyathā hy aviśuddhaḥ syād ekāṅgasyāpi darśane || Vi_12.6 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:669: tvam ambhaḥ sarvabhūtānām antaś carasi sākṣivat /
GSD36visnu_pu:670: tvam evāmbho vijānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ || Vi_12.7 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:672: tad enaṃ saṃśayād asmād dharmatas trātum arhasi || Vi_12.8 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:676: tasya ca yavasaptakaṃ ghṛtaplutam abhiśastāya dadyāt // Vi_13.4 //
GSD36visnu_pu:678: viśuddhaṃ tam iti jñātvā divasānte visarjayet || Vi_13.5 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:679: viṣatvād viṣamatvāc ca krūraṃ tvaṃ sarvadehinām /
GSD36visnu_pu:680: tvam eva viṣa jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ || Vi_13.6 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:682: tad enaṃ saṃśayād asmād dharmatas trātum arhasi || Vi_13.7 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:684: ugrān devān samabhyarcya tatsnānodakāt prasṛtitrayaṃ pibet // Vi_14.2 //
GSD36visnu_pu:685: idaṃ mayā na kṛtam iti vadan sthāpitadevatābhimukhaḥ // Vi_14.3 //
GSD36visnu_pu:686: yasya paśyed dvisaptāhāt trisaptāhād athāpi vā /
GSD36visnu_pu:687: rogo 'gnir jñātimaraṇaṃ rājātaṅkaṃ athāpi vā || Vi_14.4 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:688: tam aśuddhaṃ vijānīyāt tathā śuddhaṃ viparyaye /
GSD36visnu_pu:689: divye ca śuddhaṃ puruṣaṃ sat kuryād dhārmiko nṛpaḥ || Vi_14.5 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:691: svakṣetre saṃskṛtāyām utpāditaḥ svayam aurasaḥ prathamaḥ // Vi_15.2 //
GSD36visnu_pu:692: niyuktāyāṃ sapiṇḍenottamavarṇena votpāditaḥ kṣetrajo dvitīyaḥ // Vi_15.3
GSD36visnu_pu:694: yas tv asyāḥ putraḥ sa me putro bhaved iti yā pitrā dattā sā putrikā //
GSD36visnu_pu:695: putrikāvidhiṃ vināpi pratipāditā bhrātṛvihīnā putrikaiva // Vi_15.6 //
GSD36visnu_pu:705: yā garbhiṇī saṃskriyate tasyāḥ putraḥ // Vi_15.16 //
GSD36visnu_pu:708: sa ca mātāpitṛbhyāṃ yasya dattaḥ // Vi_15.19 //
GSD36visnu_pu:725: patanīye karmaṇi kṛte tv anantarotpannāḥ // Vi_15.36 //
GSD36visnu_pu:730: ekoḍhānām apy ekasyāḥ putraḥ sarvāsāṃ putra eva // Vi_15.41 //
GSD36visnu_pu:733: punnāmno narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:734: tasmāt puttra iti proktaḥ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvā || Vi_15.44 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:735: ṛṇam asmin saṃnayaty amṛtatvaṃ ca gacchati /
GSD36visnu_pu:736: pitā putrasya jātasya paśyec cej jīvato mukham || Vi_15.45 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:738: atha putrasya pautreṇa bradhnasyāpnoti viṣṭapam || Vi_15.46 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:740: dauhitro 'pi hy aputraṃ taṃ saṃtārayati pautravat || Vi_15.47 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:754: caṇḍālānāṃ bahir grāmanivasanaṃ mṛtacailadhāraṇam iti viśeṣaḥ // Vi_16.14
GSD36visnu_pu:758: pracchannā vā prakāśā vā veditavyāḥ svakarmabhiḥ || Vi_16.17 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:761: pitā cet putrān vibhajet tasya svecchā svayam upārjite 'rthe // Vi_17.1 //
GSD36visnu_pu:762: paitāmahe tv arthe pitṛputrayos tulyaṃ svāmitvam // Vi_17.2 //
GSD36visnu_pu:777: saṃsṛṣṭinas tu saṃsṛṣṭī sodarasya tu sodaraḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:778: dadyād apaharec cāṃśaṃ jātasya ca mṛtasya ca || Vi_17.17 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:781: brāhmādiṣu caturṣu vivāheṣv aprajāyām atītāyāṃ tadbhartuḥ // Vi_17.19 //
GSD36visnu_pu:783: sarveṣv eva prasūtāyāṃ yaddhanaṃ tat duhitṛgāmi // Vi_17.21 //
GSD36visnu_pu:784: patyau jīvati yaḥ strībhir alaṃkāro dhṛto bhavet /
GSD36visnu_pu:785: na taṃ bhajeran dāyādā bhajamānāḥ patanti te || Vi_17.22 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:787: yasya yat paitṛkaṃ rikthaṃ sa tad gṛhṇīta netaraḥ || Vi_17.23 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:788: brāhmaṇasya caturṣu varṇeṣu cet putrā bhaveyuḥ, te paitṛkaṃ rikthaṃ
GSD36visnu_pu:794: atha cet śūdravarjaṃ brāhmaṇasya putratrayaṃ bhavet, tadā taddhanaṃ navadhā vibhajeyuḥ varnānukrameṇa catustridvibhāgīkṛtān aṃśān ādadyuḥ // Vi_18.7 //
GSD36visnu_pu:795: vaiśyavarjam aṣṭadhā kṛtaṃ caturas trīn ekaṃ cādadyuḥ // Vi_18.8 //
GSD36visnu_pu:796: kṣatriyavarjam saptadhā kṛtaṃ caturo dvāv ekaṃ ca // Vi_18.9 //
GSD36visnu_pu:797: brāhmaṇavarjaṃ ṣaḍdhā kṛtaṃ trīn dvāv ekaṃ ca // Vi_18.10 //
GSD36visnu_pu:798: kṣatriyasya kṣatriyāvaiśyāśūdrāputreṣv ayam eva vibhāgaḥ // Vi_18.11 //
GSD36visnu_pu:799: atha brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇakṣatriyau putrau syātāṃ, tadā saptadhā kṛtād
GSD36visnu_pu:802: atha brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇavaiśyau, tadā ṣaḍdhā vibhaktasya caturo 'ṃśān
GSD36visnu_pu:805: atha brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇaśūdrau putrau syātāṃ, tadā taddhanam pañcadhā
GSD36visnu_pu:809: atha brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyasya vā kṣatriyavaiśyau putrau syātāṃ, tadā taddhanaṃ pañcadhā vibhajeyātām trīn aṃśān kṣatriyas tv ādadyāt // Vi_18.20 //
GSD36visnu_pu:811: atha brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyasya vā kṣatriyaśūdrau putrau syātāṃ, tadā taddhanaṃ caturdhā vibhajeyātām trīn aṃśān kṣatriyas tv ādadyāt // Vi_18.23 //
GSD36visnu_pu:813: atha brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyasya vaiśyasya vā vaiśyaśūdrau putrau syātāṃ, tadā taddhanaṃ tridhā vibhajeyātām // Vi_18.25 //
GSD36visnu_pu:814: dvāv aṃśau vaiśyas tv ādadyāt // Vi_18.26 //
GSD36visnu_pu:820: dvijātīnāṃ śūdras tv ekaḥ putro 'rdhaharaḥ // Vi_18.32 //
GSD36visnu_pu:821: aputrarikthasya yā gatiḥ, sātrārdhasya dvitīyasya // Vi_18.33 //
GSD36visnu_pu:824: samānavarṇāḥ putrāḥ samān aṃśān ādadyuḥ // Vi_18.36 //
GSD36visnu_pu:826: yadi dvau brāhmaṇīputrau syātām ekaḥ śūdrāputraḥ, tadā navadhā vibhaktasyārthasya brāhmaṇīputrāv aṣṭau bhāgān ādadyātām ekaṃ śūdrāputraḥ
GSD36visnu_pu:827: atha śūdrāputrāv ubhau syātām eko brāhmaṇīputraḥ, tadā ṣaḍdhā vibhaktasyārthasya caturo 'ṃśān brāhmaṇas tv ādadyāt, dvāv aṃśau śūdrāputrau // Vi_18.39 //
GSD36visnu_pu:829: vibhaktāḥ saha jīvanto vibhajeran punar yadi /
GSD36visnu_pu:830: samas tatra vibhāgaḥ syāj jyaiṣṭhyaṃ tatra na vidyate || Vi_18.41 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:832: svayam īhitalabdhaṃ tan nākāmo dātum arhati || Vi_18.42 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:833: paitṛkaṃ tu yadā dravyam anavāptaṃ yad āpnuyāt /
GSD36visnu_pu:834: na tat putrair bhajet sārdham akāmaḥ svayam arjitam || Vi_18.43 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:835: vastraṃ patram alaṃkāraḥ kṛtānnam udakaṃ striyaḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:836: yogakṣemaṃ pracāraś ca na vibhājyaṃ ca pustakam || Vi_18.44 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:837: mṛtaṃ dvijaṃ na śūdreṇa nirhārayet // Vi_19.1 //
GSD36visnu_pu:839: pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca putrā nirhareyuḥ // Vi_19.3 //
GSD36visnu_pu:840: na dvijaṃ pitaram api śūdrāḥ // Vi_19.4 //
GSD36visnu_pu:841: brāhmaṇam anāthaṃ ye brāhmaṇā nirharanti te svargalokabhājaḥ // Vi_19.5 //
GSD36visnu_pu:842: nirhṛtya ca bāndhavaṃ pretaṃ saṃṣkṛtyāpradakṣiṇena citām abhigamyāpsu savāsaso nimajjanaṃ kuryuḥ // Vi_19.6 //
GSD36visnu_pu:843: pretasyodakanirvapaṇaṃ kṛtvaikaṃ piṇḍaṃ kuśeṣu dadyuḥ // Vi_19.7 //
GSD36visnu_pu:844: privartitavāsasaś ca nimbapatrāṇi vidaśya dvāry aśmani padanyāsaṃ kṛtvā gṛhaṃ praviśeyuḥ // akṣatāṃś cāgnau kṣipeyuḥ // Vi_19.9 //
GSD36visnu_pu:847: yāvat saṃkhyam asthi puruṣasya gaṅgāmbhasi tiṣṭhati, tāvad varṣasahasrāṇi svargalokam adhitiṣṭhati yāvad āśaucaṃ tāvat pretasyodakaṃ piṇḍam ekaṃ ca dadyuḥ // Vi_19.13 //
GSD36visnu_pu:852: grāmān niṣkramyāśaucānte kṛtaśmaśrukarmāṇas tilakalkaiḥ sarṣapakalkair vā snātāḥ parivartitavāsaso gṛhaṃ praviśeyuḥ // Vi_19.18 //
GSD36visnu_pu:853: tatra śāntiṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇānāṃ ca pūjanaṃ kuryuḥ // Vi_19.19 //
GSD36visnu_pu:857: brāhmaṇābhihitaṃ vākyaṃ na mithyā jāyate kvacit || Vi_19.22 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:858: yad brāhmaṇās tuṣṭatamā vadanti tad devatāḥ pratyabhinandayanti /
GSD36visnu_pu:859: tuṣṭeṣu tuṣṭāḥ satataṃ bhavanti pratyakṣadeveṣu parokṣadevāḥ || Vi_19.23
GSD36visnu_pu:861: vākyais tu yair bhūmi tavābhidhāsye vākyāny ahaṃ tāni mano 'bhirāme ||
GSD36visnu_pu:862: yad uttarāyaṇaṃ tad ahar devānām // Vi_20.1 //
GSD36visnu_pu:876: evaṃvidhenāhorātreṇa māsavarṣagaṇanayā sarvasyaiva brahmaṇo varṣaśatam āyuḥ // Vi_20.15 //
GSD36visnu_pu:877: brahmāyuṣā ca paricchinnaḥ pauruṣo divasaḥ // Vi_20.16 //
GSD36visnu_pu:880: paurūṣeyāṇām ahorātrāṇām atītānāṃ saṃkhyaiva nāsti // Vi_20.19 //
GSD36visnu_pu:884: na tadbhūtaṃ prapaśyāmi sthitir yasya bhaved dhruvā || Vi_20.22 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:885: gaṅgāyāḥ sikatā dhārās tathā varṣati vāsave /
GSD36visnu_pu:886: śakyā gaṇayituṃ loke na vyatītāḥ pitāmahāḥ || Vi_20.23 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:888: sarvalokapradhānāś ca manavaś ca caturdaśa || Vi_20.24 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:890: vinaṣtānīha kālena manujeṣv atha kā kathā || Vi_20.25 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:891: rājarṣayaś ca bahavaḥ sarvaiḥ samuditā guṇaiḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:892: devā brahmarṣayaś caiva kālena nidhanaṃ gatāḥ || Vi_20.26 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:894: te 'pi kālena nīyante kālo hi duratikramaḥ || Vi_20.27 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:895: ākramya sarvaḥ kālena paralokaṃ ca nīyate /
GSD36visnu_pu:896: karmapāśavaśo jantus tatra kā paridevanā || Vi_20.28 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:897: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca /
GSD36visnu_pu:898: arthe duṣparihārye 'smin nāsti loke sahāyatā || Vi_20.29 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:900: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyā kāryā svaśaktitaḥ || Vi_20.30 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:901: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cobhau sahāyau yasya gacchataḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:902: bāndhavais tasya kiṃ kāryaṃ śocadbhir atha vā na vā || Vi_20.31 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:903: bāndhavānām aśauce tu sthitiṃ preto na vindati /
GSD36visnu_pu:904: atas tv abhyeti tān eva piṇḍatoyapradāyinaḥ || Vi_20.32 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:905: arvāk sapiṇdīkaraṇāt preto bhavati yo mṛtaḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:910: mānuṣye ca tathāpnoti śrāddhaṃ dattaṃ svabāndhavaiḥ || Vi_20.35 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:911: pretasya śrāddhakartuś ca puṣṭiḥ śrāddhe kṛte dhruvam /
GSD36visnu_pu:912: tasmāc chrāddhaṃ sadā kāryaṃ śokaṃ tyaktvā nirarthakam || Vi_20.36 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:913: etāvad eva kartavyaṃ sadā pretasya bandhubhiḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:914: nopakuryān naraḥ śocan pretasyātmana eva ca || Vi_20.37 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:915: dṛṣṭvā lokam anākrandaṃ mriyamāṇāṃś ca bāndhavān /
GSD36visnu_pu:916: dharmam ekaṃ sahāyārthaṃ varayadhvaṃ sadā narāḥ || Vi_20.38 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:917: mṛto 'pi bāndhavaḥ śakto nānugantuṃ naraṃ mṛtam /
GSD36visnu_pu:918: jāyāvarjaṃ hi sarvasya yāmyaḥ panthā virudhyate || Vi_20.39 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:919: dharma eko 'nuyāty enaṃ yatra kvacana gāminam /
GSD36visnu_pu:920: nanv asāre nṛloke 'smin dharmaṃ kuruta mā ciram || Vi_20.40 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:921: śvaḥ kāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikam /
GSD36visnu_pu:922: na hi pratīkṣate mṛtyuḥ kṛtaṃ vāsya na vākṛtam || Vi_20.41 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:924: vṛkīvoraṇam āsādya mṛtyur ādāya gacchati || Vi_20.42 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:925: na kālasya priyaḥ kaścid dveṣyaś cāsya na vidyate /
GSD36visnu_pu:926: āyuṣye karmaṇi kṣīṇe prasahya harate janam || Vi_20.43 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:928: kuśāgreṇāpi saṃṣpṛṣṭaḥ prāptakālo na jīvati || Vi_20.44 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:929: nauśadhāni na mantrāś ca na homā na punar japāḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:930: trāyante mṛtyunopetaṃ jarayā vāpi mānavam || Vi_20.45 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:932: na nivārayituṃ śaktas tatra kā paridevanā || Vi_20.46 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:934: tathā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma kartāraṃ vindate dhruvam || Vi_20.47 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:936: avyaktanidhanāny eva tatra kā paridevanā || Vi_20.48 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:937: dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā /
GSD36visnu_pu:938: tahtā dehāntaraprāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati || Vi_20.49 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:939: gṛhṇātīha yathā vastraṃ tyaktvā pūrvadhṛtaṃ naraḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:940: gṛhṇāty evaṃ navaṃ dehī dehaṃ karmanibandhanam || Vi_20.50 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:941: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:942: na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ || Vi_20.51 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:944: nityaḥ satatagaḥ sthāṇur acalo 'yaṃ sanātanaḥ || Vi_20.52 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:946: tasmād evaṃ viditvainaṃ nānuśocitum arhatha || Vi_20.53 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:947: athāśaucavyapagame susnātaḥ suprakṣālitapāṇipādaḥ svācāntas tv evaṃvidhān eva brāhmaṇān yathāśakti udaṅmukhān gandhamālyavastrālaṃkārādibhiḥ pūjitān bhojayet // Vi_21.1 //
GSD36visnu_pu:949: ucchiṣṭasaṃnidhāv ekam eva tannāmagotrābhyāṃ piṇḍaṃ nirvapet // Vi_21.3 //
GSD36visnu_pu:950: bhuktavatsu brāhmaṇeṣu dakṣiṇayābhipūjiteṣu pretanāmagotrābhyāṃ dattākṣayyodakaḥ caturaṅgulapṛthvīḥ tāvadantarāḥ tāvadadhaḥkhātāḥ vitastyāyatāḥ tisraḥ karṣūḥ kuryāt // Vi_21.4 //
GSD36visnu_pu:951: karṣūsamīpe cāgnitrayam upasamādhāya paristīrya tatraikaikasmin āhutitrayaṃ juhuyāt // Vi_21.5
GSD36visnu_pu:955: sthānatraye ca prāgvat piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ kuryāt // Vi_21.9 //
GSD36visnu_pu:956: annadadhighṛtamadhumāṃsaiḥ karṣūtrayaṃ pūrayitvā etat ta iti japet //
GSD36visnu_pu:958: saṃvatsarānte pretāya tatpitre tatpitāmahāya tatprapitāmahāya ca brāhmaṇān devapūrvān bhojayet atrāgnaukaraṇam āvāhanaṃ pādyaṃ ca kuryāt // Vi_21.13 //
GSD36visnu_pu:959: saṃsṛjatu tvā pṛthivī samānī ca iti ca pretapādyapātre pitṛpādyapātratraye yojayet // Vi_21.14
GSD36visnu_pu:961: brāhmaṇāṃś ca svācāntān dattadakṣiṇāṃś cānuvrajya visarjayet // Vi_21.16
GSD36visnu_pu:962: tataḥ pretapiṇḍaṃ pādyapātrodakavat piṇḍatraye nidadhyāt // Vi_21.17 //
GSD36visnu_pu:964: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ māsikārthavat dvādaśāhaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni vā kuryāt // Vi_21.19
GSD36visnu_pu:966: saṃvatsarābhyantare yady adhimāso bhavet, tadā māsikārthe dinam ekaṃ vardhayet // Vi_21.21
GSD36visnu_pu:967: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ strīṇāṃ kāryam evaṃ tathā bhavet /
GSD36visnu_pu:968: yāvaj jīvaṃ tathā kuryāc chrāddhaṃ tu prativatsaram || Vi_21.22 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:970: tasyāpy annaṃ sodakumbhaṃ dadyād varṣaṃ dvijanmane || Vi_21.23 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:971: brāhmaṇasya sapiṇḍānāṃ jananamaraṇayor daśāham āśaucam // Vi_22.1 //
GSD36visnu_pu:975: sapiṇḍatā ca puruṣe saptame vinivartate // Vi_22.5 //
GSD36visnu_pu:978: brāhmaṇādīnām aśauce yaḥ sakṛd evānnam atti tasya tāvad āśaucaṃ yāvat teṣām // Vi_22.8 //
GSD36visnu_pu:980: savarṇasyāśauce dvijo bhuktvā sravantīm āsādya tannimagnas triraghamarṣaṇaṃ japtvottīrya gāyatryaṣṭasahasraṃ japet // Vi_22.10 //
GSD36visnu_pu:981: kṣatriyāśauce brāhmaṇas tv etad evopoṣitaḥ kṛtvā śudhyati // Vi_22.11 //
GSD36visnu_pu:984: brāhmaṇāśauce rājanyaḥ kṣatriyāśauce vaiśyaś ca sravantīm āsādya gāyatrīśatapañcakaṃ japet vaiśyaś ca brāhmaṇāśauce gāyatryaṣṭaśataṃ japet // Vi_22.15 //
GSD36visnu_pu:985: śūdrāśauce dvijo bhuktvā prājāpatyaṃ caret // Vi_22.16 //
GSD36visnu_pu:986: śūdraś ca dvijāśauce snānam ācaret // Vi_22.17 //
GSD36visnu_pu:987: śūdraḥ śūdrāśauce snātaḥ pañcagavyaṃ pibet // Vi_22.18 //
GSD36visnu_pu:988: patnīnāṃ dāsānām ānulomyena svāminas tulyam āśaucam // Vi_22.19 //
GSD36visnu_pu:995: jātamṛte mṛtajāte vā kulasya sadyaḥ śaucam // Vi_22.26 //
GSD36visnu_pu:996: adantajāte bāle prete sadya eva // Vi_22.27 //
GSD36visnu_pu:998: dantajāte tv akṛtacūḍe tv ahorātreṇa // Vi_22.29 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1003: tatprasavamaraṇe cet pitṛgṛhe syātāṃ , tadā ekarātraṃ trirātraṃ ca //
GSD36visnu_pu:1004: jananāśaucamadhye yady aparaṃ jananāśaucaṃ syāt , tadā pūrvāśaucavyapagame śuddhiḥ // Vi_22.35
GSD36visnu_pu:1008: śrutvā deśāntarastho jananamaraṇe āśaucaśeṣeṇa śudhyet // Vi_22.39 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1011: ācārye mātāmahe ca vyatīte trirātreṇa // Vi_22.42 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1012: anauraseṣu putreṣu jāteṣu ca mṛteṣu ca /
GSD36visnu_pu:1013: parapūrvāsu bhāryāsu prasūtāsu mṛtāsu ca || Vi_22.43 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1027: patitasya dāsī mṛte 'hni padā apāṃ ghaṭam apavarjayet // Vi_22.57 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1028: udbandhanamṛtasya yaḥ pāśaṃ chindyāt sa taptakṛcchreṇa śudhyati //
GSD36visnu_pu:1031: sarvasyaiva pretasya bāndhavaiḥ sahāśrupātaṃ kṛtvā snānena // Vi_22.61 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1033: dvijaḥ śūdrapretānugamanaṃ kṛtvā sravantīm āsādya tannimagnaḥ triraghamarṣaṇaṃ japtvottīrya gāyatryaṣṭasahasraṃ japet // Vi_22.63 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1035: śūdraḥ pretānugamanaṃ kṛtvā snānam ācaret // Vi_22.65 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1036: citādhūmasevane sarve varṇāḥ snānam ācareyuḥ // Vi_22.66 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1037: maithune duḥsvapne rudhiropagatakaṇṭhe vamanavirekayoś ca // Vi_22.67 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1039: śavaspṛśaṃ ca spṛṣṭvā rajasvalācaṇḍālayūpāṃś ca // Vi_22.69 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1041: sarveṣv eteṣu snāneṣu vastraṃ nāprakṣālitaṃ bibhṛyāt // Vi_22.71 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1043: rajasvalā hīnavarṇāṃ rajasvalāṃ spṛṣṭvā na tāvad aśnīyāt yāvan na śuddhā
GSD36visnu_pu:1044: savarṇām adhikavarṇāṃ vā spṛṣṭvā sadyaḥ snātvā śudhyati // Vi_22.74 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1045: kṣutvā suptvā bhuktvā bhojanādhyayanepsuḥ pītvā snātvā niṣṭhīvya vāsaḥ paridhāya rathyām ākramya mūtrapurīṣaṃ kṛtvā pañcanakhāsthy asnehaṃ spṛṣṭvā cācamet // Vi_22.75 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1047: nābher adhastāt prabāhuṣu ca kāyikair malaiḥ surābhir madyaiś copahato mṛttoyais tadaṅgaṃ prakṣālya śudhyet // Vi_22.77 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1048: anyatropahato mṛttoyais tadaṅgaṃ prakṣālya snānena // Vi_22.78 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1049: vaktropahatas tv upoṣya snātvā pañcagavyena // Vi_22.79 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1051: vasā śukram asṛṅ majjā mūtraṃ viṭ karṇaviṇnakhāḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:1052: śleṣmāśru dūṣikā svedo dvādaśaite nṛṇāṃ malāḥ || Vi_22.81 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1053: gauḍī mādhvī ca paiṣṭī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā /
GSD36visnu_pu:1054: yathaivaikā tathā sarvā na pātavyā dvijātibhiḥ || Vi_22.82 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1058: rājanyaś caiva vaiśyaś ca spṛṣṭvaitāni na duṣyataḥ || Vi_22.84 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1059: guroḥ pretasya śiṣyas tu pitṛmedhaṃ samācaran /
GSD36visnu_pu:1060: pretāhāraiḥ samaṃ tatra daśarātreṇa śudhyati || Vi_22.85 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1061: ācāryaṃ svam upādhyāyaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ gurum /
GSD36visnu_pu:1062: nirhṛtya tu vratī pretān na vratena viyujyate || Vi_22.86 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1063: ādiṣṭī nodakaṃ kuryād ā vratasya samāpanāt /
GSD36visnu_pu:1064: samāpte tūdakaṃ kṛtvā trirātreṇaiva śudhyati || Vi_22.87 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1066: vāyuḥ karmārkakālau ca śuddhikartṝṇi dehinām || Vi_22.88 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1067: sarveṣām eva śaucānām annaśaucaṃ paraṃ smṛtam /
GSD36visnu_pu:1068: yo 'nne śuciḥ sa hi śucir na mṛdvāriśuciḥ śuciḥ || Vi_22.89 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1071: mṛttoyaiḥ śudhyate śodhyaṃ nadī vegena śudhyati /
GSD36visnu_pu:1072: rajasā strī manoduṣṭā saṃnyāsena dvijottamāḥ || Vi_22.91 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1073: adbhir gātrāṇi śudhyanti manaḥ satyena śudhyati /
GSD36visnu_pu:1074: vidyātapobhyāṃ bhūtātmā buddhir jñānena śudhyati || Vi_22.92 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1075: eṣa śaucasya te proktaḥ śārīrasya vinirṇayaḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:1076: nānāvidhānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ śuddheḥ śṛṇu vinirṇayam || Vi_22.93 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1077: śārīrair malaiḥ surābhir madyair vā yad upahataṃ tad atyantopahatam //
GSD36visnu_pu:1078: atyantopahataṃ sarvaṃ lohabhāṇḍam agnau prakṣiptaṃ śudhyet // Vi_23.2 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1079: maṇimayam aśmamayam abjaṃ ca saptarātraṃ mahīnikhananena // Vi_23.3 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1082: atyantopahatasya vastrasya yat prakṣālitaṃ sad virajyate tac chindyāt //
GSD36visnu_pu:1110: dravyavat kṛtaśaucānāṃ devatārcānāṃ bhūyaḥ pratiṣṭhāpanena // Vi_23.34 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1111: asiddhasyānnasya yanmātram upahataṃ tanmātraṃ parityajya śeṣasya kaṇḍanaprakṣālane kuryāt droṇābhyadhikam siddham annam upahataṃ na duṣyati // Vi_23.36 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1112: tasyopahatamātram apāsya gāyatryābhimantritaṃ suvarṇāmbhaḥ prakṣipet bastasya ca pradarśayed agneś ca // Vi_23.37 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1114: dūṣitaṃ keśakīṭaiś ca mṛtprakṣepeṇa śudhyati || Vi_23.38 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1115: yāvan nāpaity amedhyāktād gandho lepaś ca tatkṛtaḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:1116: tāvan mṛdvāri deyaṃ syāt sarvāsu dravyaśuddhiṣu || Vi_23.39 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1117: ajāśvaṃ mukhato medhyaṃ na gaur na narajā malāḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:1121: prāṇinām atha sarveṣāṃ mṛdbhir adbhiś ca kārayet /
GSD36visnu_pu:1122: atyantopahatānāṃ ca śaucaṃ nityam atandritam || Vi_23.42 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1123: bhūmiṣṭham udakaṃ puṇyaṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ yatra gor bhavet /
GSD36visnu_pu:1124: avyāptaṃ ced amedhyena tadvad eva śilāgatam || Vi_23.43 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1126: apaḥ samuddharet sarvāḥ śeṣaṃ vastreṇa śodhayet || Vi_23.44 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1130: kūpavat kathitā śuddhir mahatsu ca na dūṣaṇam || Vi_23.46 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1132: adṛṣṭam adbhir nirṇiktaṃ yac ca vācā praśasyate || Vi_23.47 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1133: nityaṃ śuddhaḥ kāruhastaḥ paṇyaṃ yac ca prasāritam /
GSD36visnu_pu:1134: brāhamaṇāntaritaṃ bhaikṣyam ākarāḥ sarva eva ca || Vi_23.48 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1135: nityam āsyaṃ śuci strīṇāṃ śakuniḥ phalapātane /
GSD36visnu_pu:1136: prasrave ca śucir vatsaḥ śvā mṛgagrahaṇe śuciḥ || Vi_23.49 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1137: śvabhir hatasya yan māṃsaṃ śuci tat parikīrtitam /
GSD36visnu_pu:1138: kravyādbhiś ca hatasyānyaiś caṇḍālādyaiś ca dasyubhiḥ || Vi_23.50 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1139: ūrdhvaṃ nābher yāni khāni tāni medhyāni nirdiśet /
GSD36visnu_pu:1140: yāny adhastāny amedhyāni dehāc caiva malāś cyutāḥ || Vi_23.51 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1142: rajo bhūr vāyur agniś ca mārjāraś ca sadā śuciḥ || Vi_23.52 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1143: nocchiṣṭaṃ kurvate mukhyā vipruṣo 'ṅge na yānti yāḥ /
GSD36visnu_pu:1144: na śmaśrūṇi gatāny āsyaṃ na dantāntaraveṣṭitam || Vi_23.53 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1145: spṛśanti bindavaḥ pādau ya ācāmayataḥ parān /
GSD36visnu_pu:1146: bhaumikais te samā jñeyā na tair aprayato bhavet || Vi_23.54 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1148: anidhāyaiva tad dravyam ācāntaḥ śucitām iyāt || Vi_23.55 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1151: dāhena ca bhuvaḥ śuddhir vāsenāpy atha vā gavām /
GSD36visnu_pu:1152: gāvaḥ pavitramaṅgalyaṃ goṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ || Vi_23.57 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1154: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ sarpiḥ kṣīraṃ dadhi ca rocanā || Vi_23.58 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1155: ṣaḍaṅgam etat paramaṃ maṅgalyaṃ paramaṃ gavām /
GSD36visnu_pu:1159: gavāṃ hi tīrthe vasatīha gaṅgā puṣṭis tathāsāṃ rajasi pravṛddhā /
GSD36visnu_pu:1160: lakṣmīḥ karīṣe praṇatau ca dharmas tāsāṃ praṇāmaṃ satataṃ ca kuryāt ||
GSD36visnu_pu:1161: atha brāhmaṇasya varṇānukrameṇa catasro bhāryā bhavanti // Vi_24.1 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1169: na sagotrāṃ na samānārṣapravarāṃ bhāryāṃ vindeta // Vi_24.9 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1170: mātṛtas tv ā pañcamāt puruṣāt *pitṛtaś cā saptamāt [pitṛtāś] // Vi_24.10
GSD36visnu_pu:1178: brāhmo daiva ārṣaḥ prājāpatyo gāndharva āsuro rākṣasaḥ paiśācaś ceti //
GSD36visnu_pu:1183: dvayoḥ sakāmayor mātāpitṛrahito yogo gāndharvaḥ // Vi_24.23 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1193: brāhmeṇa vivāhena kanyāṃ dadat brahmalokaṃ gamayati // Vi_24.33 //
GSD36visnu_pu:1198: pitā pitāmaho bhrātā sakulyo mātāmaho mātā ceti kanyāpradāḥ // Vi_24.38 //

GSD36visnu_pu:3148_0: kanīnike akṣikūṭe śaṣkulī karṇau karṇapatrakau gaṇḍau bhruvau śaṅkhau dantaveṣṭau oṣṭhau kakundare vaṅkṣaṇau vṛṣaṇau vṛkkau
GSD36visnu_pu:3148_1: śleṣmasaṃghātikau stanau upajihvā sphicau bāhū jaṅghe ūrū piṇḍike tālūdaraṃ bastiśīrṣau cibukaṃ galaśuṇḍike avaṭuś cety asmin
GSD36visnu_pu:3151: hastau pādau pāyūpasthaṃ jihveti karmendriyāṇi // Vi_96.95 //

GSD36visnu_pu:3157_1: cānavalokayan vibhīḥ praśāntātmā caturviṃśatyā tattvair vyatītaṃ cintayet // Vi_97.1 //

GSD36visnu_pu:3163_1: tatra labdhalakṣaḥ tatparityajyāparam aparaṃ dhyāyet // Vi_97.7 //

GSD36visnu_pu:3166_1: śaṅkhacakragadāpadmadharaṃ caraṇamadhyagatabhuvaṃ dhyāyet // Vi_97.10 yad dhyāyati tad āpnotīti dhyānaguhyam // Vi_97.11 //

GSD36visnu_pu:3168: na ca puruṣaṃ vinā kiṃcid apy akṣaram asti // Vi_97.13 //
GSD36visnu_pu:3170: puram ākramya sakalaṃ śete yasmān mahāprabhuḥ /

GSD36visnu_pu:3175: aśaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca || Vi_97.17 ||
GSD36visnu_pu:3176: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca /

GSD36visnu_pu:3178: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūtena vibhaktam iva ca sthitam /
